name: .GOB
summary: Learn about .GOB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: GOB files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the game built with Jedi Engine references the files to load the assets they contain.

While players typically donâ€™t interact with GOB files, game modders and developers may use special tools to extract or modify them, creating custom content or troubleshooting game assets. For example, they may use SLADE to preview and edit the contents of a GOB file.
